titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of self-tapping screws.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/5/1998--Introduced. Provides, upon request, for the reliquidation of certain entries of self-tapping screws.
